#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define s(x) scanf("%d", &x)

using namespace std;

int main()
{

	int t,k,l,i,n;
	
	cin >> t;
	
	while(t--)
	{
		cin >> n;
		
		k = n / 7;
		
		if(k == 0 && n%4 == 0)
			cout << 0 << endl;
			
		else if(k == 0 && n%4 != 0)
		  	cout << -1 << endl;
		  	
		int count = 0;	
		while(k)
		{
			l = n - (k * 7);
			if(l % 4 == 0)
			{	
				count++;
				cout << k*7 << endl;
				break;
			}
			k--;
		}
		if(count == 0 && n/7 != 0)
		cout << -1 << endl;
	}
}
